Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model

Class GameContext

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.common.EventDispatcher
it.polimi.ingsw.common.AsynchronousEventDispatcher
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.GameContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class GameContext extends AsynchronousEventDispatcher
This class manages the states and actions of a game.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start​(View view, String nickname)
      Starting routine for GameContext. Dispatches the game's data to the specified client and assigns the initial faith points to the specified player.
      Parameters:
      view - the View to dispatch the state to
      nickname - the nickname of the player connecting to the context

    • resume

      public void resume​(View view, String nickname)
      Sends the game's data to players that reconnect.
      Parameters:
      view -
      nickname - the nickname of the player reconnecting

    • chooseLeaders

      public void chooseLeaders​(View view, String nickname, List<Integer> leaderIds)
      Choose leaders from the hand of a player.
      Parameters:
      view - the view the action originates from. Used to on back errors
      nickname - the player
      leaderIds - the leader cards to choose

    • chooseResources

      public void chooseResources​(View view, String nickname, Map<Integer,​Map<String,​Integer>> reducedShelves)
      Chooses the initial resources to take as a player.
      Parameters:
      view - the view the action originates from. Used to on back errors
      nickname - the player
      reducedShelves - the destination shelves

    • swapShelves

      public void swapShelves​(View view, String nickname, Integer shelfId1, Integer shelfId2)
      Swaps the content of two shelves of a player.
      Parameters:
      view - the view the action originates from. Used to on back errors
      nickname - the player
      shelfId1 - the first shelf
      shelfId2 - the second shelf

    • takeMarketResources

      public void takeMarketResources​(View view, String nickname, boolean isRow, int index, Map<String,​Integer> replacements, Map<Integer,​Map<String,​Integer>> reducedShelves)
      Takes resources from the market as a player.
      Parameters:
      view - the view the action originates from. Used to on back errors
      nickname - the player
      isRow - true if a row is selected; false if a column is selected.
      index - index of the selected row or column
      replacements - a map of the chosen resources to take, if choices are applicable
      reducedShelves - a map of the shelves where to add the taken resources, if possible

    • buyDevCard

      public void buyDevCard​(View view, String nickname, String color, int level, int slotIndex, Map<Integer,​Map<String,​Integer>> reducedResContainers)
      Makes a player buy a development card from the development card grid.
      Parameters:
      view - the view the action originates from. Used to on back errors
      nickname - the player
      color - the color of the card to be bought
      level - the level of the card to be bought
      slotIndex - the index of the deview slot where to put the development card
      reducedResContainers - a map of the resource containers where to take the storable resources

    • activateProductionRequests

      public void activateProductionRequests​(View view, String nickname, List<ReducedProductionRequest> reducedProdRequests)
      Makes a player activate a group of productions.
      Parameters:
      view - the view the action originates from. Used to on back errors
      nickname - the player
      reducedProdRequests - the group of requested contemporary productions
